title: Cougar Workout with Joyce Vedral - Look Young & Sexy Forever!
description: For women who want to look young and sexy forever! Your workout time is 20 minutes a day for the 3 day routine, 30 minutes for the 2 day routine. You'll see clear toning and definition in just 3 weeks. You do between 4 and 10 exercises per body part, in just the right order to challenge your muscles to the max without exhaustion. In addition to toning, you get a great aerobic workout too!
